about_the_game:
Demo

The demo contains only a part of the finished game. The demo should give you a taste of the game and be used to find bugs.

Steal It

Steal It is an online multiplayer game 🎮 where it depends on who has the most coins 🪙 at the end of a round.

Coins can either be obtained as rewards by completing tasks ✅ or by stealing them from other players 🕵️‍♂️.

The game has two game modes: a team mode 🤝 and a free-for-all mode 💥.

In team mode, there are two teams. One team tries to get coins by completing tasks 🧩 while the other tries to steal them undetected 😈.

The players have the opportunity to track down thieves 🧐 and lock them up in prison 🚔.

In the free-for-all mode, everyone is on their own 🏃‍♂️. At certain time intervals ⏳, the abilities you can use will change 🔄. You can either steal 🕶️ or perform tasks 🛠️.
